column1: 711111,Clay Products Machine Operator,,"Produce clay or ceramics products
column9: Package products for storage or shipment
column11: Prepare moulds or casts for production
column13: Measure dimensions of completed products or work pieces to verify conformance to specifications
column15: Adjust temperature controls of ovens or other heating equipment
column17: Mount attachments or tools onto production equipment
column23: Cut industrial materials in preparation for fabrication or processing
column25: Adjust equipment controls to regulate flow of production
column27: Set equipment controls to meet cutting specifications
column29: Measure ingredients or substances to be used
column33: Place materials into or onto moulds
column35: Remove products or work pieces from production equipment
column37: Inspect finishes of work pieces or finished products
column41: Monitor equipment operation to ensure proper functioning
column45: Move products, materials or equipment between work areas
column49: Read work orders or other instructions to determine product specifications or materials requirements
column51: Collect samples of materials or products for testing
column53: Maintain inventories of materials, equipment or products
column55: Notify others of equipment repair or maintenance needs",0.06209677419354838
